---
name: Bug report
about: A printer isn't working or output is wrong
title: "[BUG] "
labels: bug
---

**Printer model**
e.g. Epson TM-T20III, Xprinter XP-58IIH

**Connection type**
USB / Serial / Network (Ethernet/Wi-Fi)

**Operating system**
e.g. Windows 11, Ubuntu 22.04, macOS 14 Sonoma

**Paper width**
58mm / 80mm / A4

**Runtime**
Native Rust / Tauri / Browser (WASM) / Node.js

**thermoprint version**
e.g. 0.1.0

**What happened**
A clear description of what went wrong.

**What you expected**
What the output should have looked like.

**Minimal code to reproduce**
```rust
// paste here
```

**Raw bytes sent (if available)**
Paste as hex or attach a .bin file.
